La_Mesa.Platt College (San Diego):
Platt College San Diego is a private college in San Diego, California. Privately owned and operated, Platt College is accredited by the Accrediting Commission of Career Schools and Colleges and offers degrees from Associates in Applied Science Degree in Graphic Design to Bachelor of Science in Media Arts (emphasis 3D Modeling / Digital Filmmaking / EFX, Graphic Design, and Web Design / Development).
